title: Debt Limit Showdown Looms as White House Braces for a Divided Washington
description: G.O.P. threats to leverage the full faith and credit of the United States to force spending cuts have raised alarm about a debt showdown next year â€” and talks about how to head one off in the coming weeks.
dc:creator: Emily Cochrane and Jim Tankersley
media:credit: Tom Brenner for The New York Times
media:description: The fight could come to a head early next year, when the government is projected to hit its borrowing limit unless Congress can muster the votes to raise it.
